26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: The Tipping Point
1.plot: In the most scientific camera comparison to date, "The Great Camera Shootout 2011: a documentary of the Single Chip Camera Evaluation (SCCE)" premieres with Episode 1: "The Tipping Point." The first episode of the 3-part web series examines three SCCE Tests: The Dynamic Range Test, The Under Exposure Test and The Over Exposure Test. In addition to the SCCE tests, the web series features commentary from some of the top DPs in the industry, filmed at worldwide screening locations in Sydney, Amsterdam, New York, London, Las Vegas (NAB) and Hollywood.

2.title: Sensors & Sensitivity
2.plot: Tests covering sensitivity, resolution, compression and the relationship between them. These tests were designed and administered by Robert Primes ASC.

3.title: It's Not So Black & White
3.plot: The Great Camera Shootout 2011 was nominated for two Emmy awards, Midwest Chapter. One nomination was for Outstanding Achievement in Informational Programming and the other was for Zacuto Editor Karen Abad's, skillful editing work.

imdb.plot outline: The Great Camera Shootout 2011 is a documentary about the Single Chip Camera Evaluation (SCCE) which is a large scale technical camera comparison administered by Robert Primes, ASC. Our documentary was designed to educate and broaden the understanding of the elements that create image quality.
imdb.title: The Great Camera Shootout 2011
plot: _The Great Camera Shootout 2011_ (qv) is a documentary about the Single Chip Camera Evaluation (SCCE) which is a large scale technical camera comparison administered by Robert Primes, ASC. Our documentary was designed to educate and broaden the understanding of the elements that create image quality.::Zacuto Films Production
